hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Requiem of Spirit#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #an Odd Mushroom#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Remember when Ganon was a blue pig?^I remember.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #4# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a sandy grotto with #fragile walls#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #the Fire Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lobby Right Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Goron Ruby#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #Epona's Song# and #a Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #4# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: Did you know that you can access the Fire Temple boss door without dropping the pillar by using the Hover boots?

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Small Key# and #a Goron Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Phantom Ganon# holds...^ #the Minuet of Forest# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Sun's Song#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Goron Ruby#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Bongo Bongo# holds...^ #the Prelude of Light# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
